April 24, 1943 D West Riding Contest (2nd Section)
West Riding Contest (2nd Section) 20 Test Piece Contest West Riding Contest west-riding-contest-2nd-section
Eastbrook Hall, Bradford March contest - 1st Hemsworth, 2nd British Ropes, 3rd Yorkshire Transport. 4 bands competed.
Jan. 31, 2019, 10:34 a.m. Sept. 28, 2019, 10:05 a.m.
1 British Ropes Silver Ed Pearce
2 Hemsworth and South Kirkby T. Garbutt
3 Batley Old C. A. Smith
4 Yorkshire Traction Luther Dyson
